114.content: How about Nuka? If you do not remember him, he was in Lion King II: Simba's pride. He was ostensibly the son of Scar and Zira, but was pushed aside and neglected so as to focus attention on Kovu, who (though not his son) is heir to Scar's reign. Nuka felt alone and outcast among the outcast, and as such was desperate for the affection or even attention of his mother Zira. In the traditional plotline he was killed trying to attack the turncoat Kovu, but then there's always other ways, aren't there?

Simba raises his head towards the sky letting gravity help you go down his throat. He continues to suck in your legs now with gravity helping him swallow you. Now the only thing left out side is your tail which quickly gets slurped up by the hungry lion. You land inside his wet stomach and you start to pound on the walls. This does nothing except make him moan in delight. The stomach acids begin to enter and you are already a 1/4 in the acid. The acid begins to digest you.
151211.title: Enter the Lion

1512112.content:
You moan in pleasure as the struggling hyena within you begins to breakdown. You hear muffled crys for help but ignore them and continue to enjoy your meal. A couple of minutes later the struggles within you stop and you know that now you can digest in peace. You walk over to a near by shaded area and fall asleep.

The next morning you wake up and see that your stomach has completely digested its meal and has returned to its original size. You quickly run towards a tree near by to do your business. You sit close to the ground and let the new form of the hyena exit your body. Once you finished you turn around and look at you last meal. All that is left of Shenzi is a few bones, some grey and black fur and a skull of the hyena. You laugh quietly walk away to leave the pile of digested Shenzi.
1512112.title: Swich Point of View (Simba)

His solders and front legs start to enter you maw as you hear Ed start to laugh. You roll your eyes at this, Ed doesn't even know that he is going to be food and be digested alive. You keep gulping him down as his chest and stomach start to enter and his head goes into your stomach. You keep swallowing and swallowing until all that is left outside of your mouth is his legs and tail which you quickly gulped up and sent to your stomach. You pat your belly as you hear him laugh inside your belly as the digestive fluids start to pour in to digest your meal. As you are patting your huge belly you hear something. You look up and see Shenzi standing there with her mouth open. She must of watch you swallow Ed. You look at her face and see she is...

Shenzi continued to rub your belly as Eds laughter was replaced with gurgles and churns. Your belly started to become rounder as Ed was being turned into mush and nutrients for your body. What to do now?

152121111.content: Ed was filling but you are still hungry. But the question is, hungry for what?
152121111.title: Still hungry

1521211111.content: You still feel hungry after your meal of Ed and you look at Shenzi that's still rubbing your belly with a hungry look. You remember the times she was also angry and mad at you. She hit you and you were like a slave to her so eating her would let you be free. You also find her very attractive and you always wanted some good sex from her. So what do you do?
1521211111.title: Tasty looking Shenzi

15212111111.content: Your hunger is higher than your sexual pleasure and decide to eat her now. Shenzi has her eyes close as she rubs your stomach trying to hear Ed digesting inside. What Shenzi doesn't know is that she is going to be there soon. Which way first?

152121111111.content: You leaned forward and grabbed Shenzi's head with you mouth and started to gulp her down. She is suprised at what just happened and starts to struggle but to no avail as her fate is seeled as food for your hungry stomach. Shenzi was ¾ down your mouth ,having your eyes closed in pleasure,rubbing your neck filling Shenzi body making a budge in her neck .As Shenzi travel downwards to your belly. You then pushed Shenzi back paws into your hungry muzzle liking ,each one before gulping them down saving the taste. Only leaving her tail left out ,as you gave a quick smirk before slurping Shenzi tail like spaghetti. As you pated your huge belly filled with a struggling Shenzi awaited to be digested. Your belly increased in size as Shenzi was fighting to get free from your gurgling belly. She was in stomach acids along with what was left of Ed.
152121111111.title: Head

1521211111111.content: The acids in your stomach start to rise as they start to digest of your newest meal. Shenzi continues to struggle in your belly but they are end in a few minutes as her fur is burned of her. The acids start to work on her flesh as Shenzi starts to become mush and nutrients for you body. You rub your bloated belly of once your two friends but they are now nothing more than belly fat, nutrients and mush. You fall asleep to the sounds of your belly gurgling.
1521211111111.title: Digest Her

15212111111111.content: The next morning you wake up to a much flatter belly. You lick your lips remembering the taste of your two friends and how they served as wonderful food for you. You get up and feel a pressure in your rump. You walk over to the corner of the cave and bend down. You start to push and feel your friends coming out. Brown mushy scat pours out of your ass along with a few bits of bone. You continue to scat for another 5 min until the last of what remains of your friends is out. You turn around to look at what has become of Ed and Shenzi. It was a beautiful pile of crap with bits of bone and a few pieces of fur. You laugh a little and turn around to leave the cave. What to do now?

info.brief_description: An interactive about the Pride lands in a hungery and cut throat way
info.description:
Ahh, the Pride lands, home of te Lion King movie, so much possiblity, so many ways for things to be difrent, in this story, by default(certain lines change it) the world is pretty much the same, though scar never made his move to take the rulership, And Simba fell in with Timone and Pumba by accident, all characters have aged to adult hood.
Character might have designs on nearly anything, Power, Vengance, Relationships, eating eachother or just plain fun, pretty much anything can happen though keep anything naughty to highly sugjestive if possible

Simba, Scar, Nala, Kovu, Kira, Shenzi, Banzi Pumbaa, Timone are all (C) Disney
info.pretty_title: Power Play in the Pride Lands
